about_the_game:
※This content requires the base game (sold separately) in order to play. Please also ensure that your base game software is updated to the most recent patch.

Description:
A new adventure in the Dia Earthlands, featuring three brand new quests! Kiesel and Lazuli take center stage as main characters! Just what kind of chaos unfolds as Lazuli undergoes a rigorous training regiment?
